title: git config  calls are again abundant

labels.name: performance
labels.description: Improve performance of an existing feature

body:
#### What is the problem?

While testing the introduced lean'ish test for #2406 I was surprised with the 'slowness' of it.  Looked at what is called and apparently it seems that `git config` calls are again quite abundant imho without a reason (duplicates etc while nothing is really changing in the repo):

which I guess attributes to overall slugishness quite a bit.  I think at some point @mih added some smart caching etc, but I guess this call slips through somehow
